hsk.py: Zhēnzhèng de péngyǒu yǒngyuǎn zhídé nǐ xìnrèn
hsk.p2: A true friend is always worthy of your trust

hsk.p1: 这段话主要介绍的是友谊
hsk.py: Zhè duàn huà zhǔyào jièshào de shì yǒuyì
hsk.p2: This passage mainly introduces friendship

hsk.p1: 当北半球到处春暖花开的时候
hsk.py: Dāng běibànqiú dàochù chūnnuǎn huā kāi de shíhòu
hsk.p2: When spring blossoms everywhere in the northern hemisphere

hsk.p1: 南半球已经进入凉快的秋天
hsk.py: Nánbànqiú yǐjīng jìnrù liángkuai de qiūtiān
hsk.p2: The southern hemisphere has entered a cool autumn

hsk.p1: 树叶也开始慢慢地变黄了
hsk.py: Shùyè yě kāishǐ màn man de biàn huángle
hsk.p2: The leaves are starting slowly to turn  yellow

hsk.p1: 当北半球的气温逐渐降低的时候
hsk.py: Dāng běibànqiú de qìwēn zhújiàn jiàngdī de shíhòu
hsk.p2: When the temperature in the northern hemisphere gradually decreases

hsk.p1: 南半球的天气却开始热起来
hsk.py: Nánbànqiú de tiānqì què kāishǐ rè qǐlái
hsk.p2: The weather in the southern hemisphere is starting to heat up

hsk.p1: 人们已经脱掉了厚厚的大衣
hsk.py: Rénmen yǐjīng tuō diàole hòu hòu de dàyī
hsk.p2: People have taken off their thick coats
